name: Yalmaha 29500 - The Stiletto
raw: ------------------------------ Ingredients ------------------------------ #L "Cold Stone" "136649" x 36 #L "Reinforced NotuComm Wire" "203646" x 6 #L "Nano Programming Interface" "161699" #L "Yalmaha 29500 - Stiletto Building Kit" "203828" #L "Ganimedes Flux - Multi-Surface Engine" "203638" #L "Klang Orbiter MK" "203636" #L "BSEC" "203480" #L "Steiner Flexipus Chassis" "203472" #L "Stiletto Registar" "203817" ------------------------------ Recipe ------------------------------ Repeat for the 36 Cold Stones: Nano Programming Interface + Cold Stone = #L "Sentient Cold Stone" "203648" Skills: | NP | ------------------------------ Repeat for the 6 Reinforced NotuComm Wires: Sentient Cold Stone + Reinforced NotuComm Wire = #L "NotuComm Circuitry with One Sensor" "203630" Skills: | ?? | ------------------------------ Sentient Cold Stone + NotuComm Circuitry with One Sensor = #L "NotuComm Circuitry with Two Sensors" "203626" Skills: | ?? | ------------------------------ Sentient Cold Stone + NotuComm Circuitry with Two Sensors = #L "NotuComm Circuitry with Three Sensors" "203628" Skills: | ?? | ------------------------------ Sentient Cold Stone + NotuComm Circuitry with Three Sensors = #L "NotuComm Circuitry with Four Sensors" "203632" Skills: | ?? | ------------------------------ Sentient Cold Stone + NotuComm Circuitry with Four Sensors = #L "NotuComm Circuitry with Five Sensors" "203634" Skills: | ?? | ------------------------------ Sentient Cold Stone + NotuComm Circuitry with Five Sensors = #L "Complete NotuComm Circuitry" "203642" Skills: | ?? | ------------------------------ Repeat for the 6 Complete NotuComm Circuitries: Complete NotuComm Circuitry + Complete NotuComm Circuitry = #L "Double NotuComm Circuitry" "203640" Skills: | ?? | ------------------------------ Double NotumComm Circuitry + Double NotumComm Circuitry = #L "Quadruple NotuComm Circuitry" "203644" Skills: | ?? | ------------------------------ Quadruple NotuComm Circuitry + Double NotumComm Circuitry = #L "NotuComm Mesh" "203624" Skills: | ?? | ------------------------------ Steiner Flexipus Chassis + Yalmaha 29500 - Stiletto Building Kit = #L "Yalmaha 29500 - Stiletto Building Kit - Step 1" "203827" Skills: | ME | ------------------------------ Ganimedes Flux -Multi-Surface Engine + Yalmaha 29500 - Stiletto Building Kit - Step 1 = #L "Yalmaha 29500 - Stiletto Building Kit - Step 2" "203825" Skills: | QT | ------------------------------ Klang Orbiter MK + Yalmaha 29500 - Stiletto Building Kit - Step 2 = #L "Yalmaha 29500 - Stiletto Building Kit - Step 3" "203823" Skills: | ?? | ------------------------------ BSEC + Yalmaha 29500 - Stiletto Building Kit - Step 3 = #L "Yalmaha 29500 - Stiletto Building Kit - Step 4" "203821" Skills: | ?? | ------------------------------ NotuComm Mesh + Yalmaha 29500 - Stiletto Building Kit - Step 4 = #L "Unmarked Yalmaha 29500 - The Stiletto" "203819" Skills: | ?? | ------------------------------ Stiletto Registar + Unmarked Yalmaha 29500 - The Stiletto = #L "Yalmaha - 29500 - The Stiletto" "203556" Skills: | ?? | ------------------------------ Comments ------------------------------ You didnt think it would be easy (or cheap) did you? Dont forget that the last step makes it NODROP, so if you are planning to sell it dont add the registrar.. sell that with it.
